text: The Italy women's national under-18 and under-19 is a national women's basketball team of Italy and is governed by the Italian Basketball Federation. http://www.fiba.com/pages/eng/fc/FIBA/fibaStru/nfLeag/p/nationalfederationnumber/307/nfProf.html It represents Italy in international under-19 and under-18 (under age 19 and under age 18) women's basketball competitions. ==FIBA Under-19 Women's World Cup results== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !width="50"| !! width=25| !! width=25| !! width=25| |- | 1985||colspan=4|not participated |- | 1989||colspan=4|not participated |- | 1993||colspan=4|not participated |- | 1997||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2001||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2005||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2007||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2009||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2011||10th|| 8 || 3 || 5 |- | 2013||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2015||colspan=4|not participated |- |style="border: 3px solid red"| 2017||11th|| 7 || 3 || 4 |- | 2019||colspan=4|not participated |- | 2021||colspan=4|Qualified |- | 2023||colspan=4|TBD |- |'Total|| '|| 15 || 6 || 9 |} ==See also== *Italy women's national basketball team *Italy women's national under-17 basketball team ==References== U Category:Women's national under-19 basketball teams
title: Italy women's national under-19 basketball team
